items.label: 539fb89bec4f024bc1dc1905
items.description:
Availability:  Available only to residential consumers in residences or individually metered apartments with a minimum 14 SEER All-electric heat pump, minimum 30-gallon electric water heater & Smart Switch load control device; winter heating savings.  


Minimum Charge:  The monthly minimum charge shall be the "Customer Charge".


Adjustment: The amount computed at the above rate shall be adjusted plus or minus by an amount calculated in accordance with the formula specified in the City's purchased power cost adjustment clause, which is incorporated by reference as a part of this rate schedule.
items.name: Residential service rate - Great rate (Schedule GR)
items.utility: City of Rock Hill, South Carolina (Utility Company)
